itemtool.settings.render.desc: this is render settings, turn on/off which you want
itemtool.settings.enable.name: Enable Render
itemtool.settings.debug.name: Debug Mode
itemtool.settings.debug.desc: Debug Mode, it doesn't anything now
itemtool.settings.precision.name: Precision
itemtool.settings.precision.desc: How many decimal places to keep, default is 4
itemtool.settings.render_range.name: Render Range
itemtool.settings.meter_per_second.name: Use M/S
itemtool.settings.meter_per_second.desc: By default, the speed is displayed in meters per tick
itemtool.settings.item_velocity.name: Velocity:
itemtool.settings.item_velocity.desc: Display velocity on the item entity
itemtool.settings.item_speed.name: Horizontal Speed
itemtool.settings.item_speed.desc: Display Horizontal speed(no y) on the item entity
itemtool.settings.item_count.name: Count
itemtool.settings.item_count.desc: Display count on the item entity
itemtool.settings.item_position.name: Position
itemtool.settings.item_position.desc: Display position on the item entity
itemtool.settings.item_on_ground.name: On Ground
itemtool.settings.item_on_ground.desc: Display if it's on the ground
itemtool.settings.item_age.name: Age
itemtool.settings.item_life_span.name: Life Span
itemtool.settings.item_life_span.desc: Display item's life span. a item survives for 6000 ticks in vanilla
itemtool.settings.item_pick_delay.name: Pick Delay
itemtool.settings.item_is_simulation_tic: The game won't simulation item per tick sometimes
